column1: Because Call Me Bingo works offline and does not collect information, you are in full control of your data and usage. Nothing you do within the app leaves your device.
Bring excitement to your Bingo games with a modern, fully featured solution that makes running Bingo
Call Me Bingo does not collect, store, or share any personal data.
Call Me Bingo does not integrate with analytics providers, advertising networks, or other third-party services.
Call Me Bingo is completely offline and does not collect, store, or share any personal data. Everything you do stays on your device, and no information is sent over the internet.
column2: Call Me Bingo fonctionne entièrement hors ligne et ne collecte, n’enregistre, ni ne partage aucune donnée personnelle. Tout reste sur votre appareil, rien n’est transmis sur Internet.

column1: Check winning cards instantly by scanning or entering them
column2: Vérifiez instantanément les cartes gagnantes en les scannant ou en les saisissant

column1: Draw the next ball randomly, on a timer, or manually
column2: Tirez la prochaine boule au hasard, à intervalles réguliers ou manuellement

column1: Enjoy built-in voice calling with adjustable speed
column2: Profitez de l’annonce vocale intégrée avec vitesse réglable

column1: Full Screen presentation of current game (AirPlay)
column2: Présentation en plein écran de la partie en cours (AirPlay)

column1: If in the future we add new features that require data usage, we will update this Privacy Policy accordingly and notify users as required by law.
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at:  support@acajou.studio
Privacy Policy for Call Me Bingo
Project a view of the draws on a big screen via AirPlay
column2: Projetez l’affichage des tirages sur grand écran via AirPlay

column1: Run smoother, more engaging Bingo sessions—whether at home, in the community, or at large events!
column2: Animez des parties de bingo fluides et captivantes — que ce soit à la maison, dans la communauté ou lors de grands événements !

column1: Supports both US-style and UK-style Bingo
column2: Support pour Bingo de Style Nord-Américain (75 boules) ou Britannique (90 boules)

column1: The app does not require an internet connection and does not transmit any information online.
We designed this application to operate entirely offline and to respect your personal information.
